properties.name: listing
minimumPrice
properties.description: Minimum price of the listing the owner agrees to sell it for

properties.name: buyNowPrice
properties.description: Price of the listing the owner agrees the listing to be immediately bought for without an auction

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: Start time of the auction

properties.name: endTime
properties.description: End time of the auction
Auction listing

properties.name: bid
bidPrice
properties.description: Price of the bid
An active bid on an auction listing

properties.name: artwork
title
properties.description: Title of the artwork

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of the artwork

properties.name: author
username
properties.description: Unique username that user can pick for themselves.

properties.name: handle
properties.description: Handle, such as from adahandle.io

properties.name: wallets
address
properties.description: Address of the wallet

properties.name: owner
properties.description: User of the NFT marketplace
An ADA crypto wallet, custodial or non-custodial
Wallets that belong to the user

properties.description: NFTs that the user is an owner of

properties.description: Active bids that the user placed on an auction
